page.title: 12THE NEW STRAND SHOPPING CNT.
page.content: The{New Strand, Bootle,}is a very busy shopping centre. Most of the shops here are inside. Many of the shops which are here are also in {Liverpool City Centre,}for example, {Marks and Spencer, Mothercare, Dolcis {and Curry's.}There is also a large department store{(T.J.Hughes)}which has three floors. We interviewed some people and found out that{56%}shop here everyday. Most of the people who shop at the{New Strand}are from{Bootle and are close enough to walk and a few get the bus. Most people were shopping{84%, 8%}were looking around, {4%}worked here and{4%}came to pay bills.{60%}of the people preferred the {New Strand}to{Liverpool.}They liked it because it was easy to get to, and things were cheap in the supermarket. They said it was a pleasant place to shop.{(Kerrie Rimmer.)
